Class Plugboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Plugboard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configuration, PipelineElement

    public class Plugboard
extends java.lang.Object
implements PipelineElement, Configuration

    A class that implements the basic functionalities of a reflector, part of the pipeline structure that models the inner working of the Enigma machine.

    Author:
    Theodor Stoican

      • transmitInput

        public void transmitInput(char input,
                 java.lang.String type)

        A method that is used for encoding the input and for storing it.

        Specified by:
        transmitInput in interface PipelineElement
        Parameters:
        input - the character to be encoded
        type - a string that indicates whether there is a direct or inverse mapping
        Throws:
        catches - a NullPointerException if the input is not among the letters within the alphabet
